name: com.yuzuval.inventory_system
description:
A project containing various useful tools. 
Includes: 
A basic singleplayer inventory with features such as:
- Exposed interface for bulk adding/removing of items
- drag and drop items around
- allows setting max stack size for items

A Hierarchal State Machine
- Sample scene uses this to control player movement

(WIP) A questing system 
- Uses the aforementioned inventory system

(WIP) Shooting mechanics

Contains Sample Scene and Game Objects
- Can modify to look different
Comes with a simple Player and Item Collector system
